guardian.title: Keystone pipeline passes House vote as Republicans defy Obama veto threat
guardian.topComment: The first thing the Republicans do when they have a little more power is to push through this boondoggle. Obviously their first priority is to pay back favors to their oil buddies, the Koch brothers and secondly to stick it to Obama, purely out of so...

guardian.title: Boris Johnson makes up with Hillary Clinton after 'sadistic nurse' comment
Pope Francis: not having children is selfish
guardian.topComment: Our species is wrecking the planet, burning oil, setting off nukes, half of all wildlife extinct in the space of just 40 years.. It's selfish to multiply even further, especially when the next generation is going to be boiled alive by global warming...

guardian.title: Poroshenko: Ukraine conflict risks spiralling out of control
